dialogue.text: Looks like my friend Guy is calling me!

We are hosting some open mic nights before the big Battle of the Bands. You know, the contest put on by the record label scout, Boss. I know that it is your dream to form a band and share your art with the world, so I signed you up!
WHAT?! I can’t do that! You know that I will just freeze up and choke…
Relax, I know that you struggle with social anxiety. There are a few folks that have been performing the last few weeks that you may be able to learn from.
…I don’t really have a choice do I?
Nope. Come to the bar, there is someone you have to meet…

Time to stop at Caffeine Central Coffee and get a quad-shot, 5-pump caramel redeye and chase my dream! Or fail miserably, embarrass myself and Guy, never use my voice again, and live the rest of my life as a rock…
